original_text: Since the Amalekites and the Canaanites are living in the valleys, turn back tomorrow and set out toward the desert along the route to the Red Sea.”
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 골짜기에 거주하나니 너희는 내일 돌이켜 홍해 길을 따라 광야로 들어갈지니라

sentences.original_text: Since the Amalekites and the Canaanites are living in the valleys
sentences.korean_translation: 아말렉 사람과 가나안 사람들이 계곡에 살고 있으므로

sentences.original_text: and set out toward the desert
along the route to the Red Sea
